owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

vcs_username.description: The username to provide to the originating repository.

vcs_password.description: The password to provide to the originating repository.

vcs.description: The type of version control system you are migrating from.

tfvc_project.description: For a tfvc import, the name of the project that is being imported.
